EmailTemplate.description: Email to seller asking for a letter of correction
EmailTemplate.name: To Seller - Letter of Correction Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: Title Information Needed:{!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
I am reaching out as we are currently in need of a Letter of Correction for the vehicle listed below. The buyer is unable to accept the title without this - please see the attached overnight label and copy of the title to expedite this process.
Year/Make/Model:{!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c}
VIN: {!Case.vehicle_id__c}
Please provide the following on dealership letterhead or state affidavit if available:
"(CORRECTION) to error on the (PART OF THE TITLE) . No Fraud Intended."
We will also need this signed by (PERSON WHO MADE ERROR.)
Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you!
